org.nd4j.linalg.learning

Class AdaDelta

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.learning.AdaDelta
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, GradientUpdater

    public class AdaDelta
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, GradientUpdater
    http://www.matthewzeiler.com/pubs/googleTR2012/googleTR2012.pdf Ada delta updater. More robust adagrad that keeps track of a moving window average of the gradient rather than the every decaying learning rates of adagrad
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
